price: 39. La idinkamana abaal mariyo waxaan aheyn waxaad fasheen.
arabic: وَمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
